subject: Asserting object equality in junit 3.8.1
msgSnippet: Hi Everyone, can anyone tell me how to assert equality of two objects such as array of bytes or Files in junit 3.8.1? using Assert.assertEquals(File1, File2)
messageBody:
Hi Everyone,

can anyone tell me how to assert equality of two objects such as array
of bytes
or Files in junit 3.8.1?

using
Assert.assertEquals(File1, File2) or assertEquals(bytearray1,
bytearray2) always states that objects are not equal..

is this method supposed to compare 'content' or that it is actually
referincing same object? - there is an assertSame method - so would think
assertEquals should compare content

thanks....
